title: "Enemy Summoner Spell and Active Item casts drop spell shards lasting 40 seconds"
body: I feel like this is an incredibly long time for these things to be on the ground. Shouldn't such a powerful spell be slightly harder to pick up, or am I missing something?

replies.body: I mean, if I never use flash or an item, Zoe essentially has no W.

She may take my life, but she will never take my flash!
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/koc/images/e/e6/Braveheart.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20110523000343

{{summoner:12}} {{summoner:13}} 
Steal these Zoe. 

HA, shows you.

Serious question. She only steals enemy spells right? Otherwise allied {{summoner:11}} would be nuts on objectives.

Just works on enemies and the occasional minion drop.

(I knew these sneaky sneaks have flash equipped, too. Their reflexes are just too bad to dodge the enemy skillshot with it)
No, they're just flashing _into_ your skillshots. Cause how else would you explain that _one_ minion that always suddenly appears between you and your desired target and body blocks the entire shot?
I can see Zoe going against a split push and being able to follow because she can pick up their tp. Which would be bonkers being honest.
lol she would bubble them at the last sec then pick up tp and follow
Just imagine, Zoe interrupting the enemy tp gank with bubble, stealing it, and then ganking with it, turning a about to be 2v3 into a 3v2.
Imagine her using her bubble at the last second so the top laner arrives asleep. The guy wastes his tp, potentially dies, misses cs and gives zoe a tp.
I would be tilted for a week if that happened to me.
I thought about that. But that would depend on the split pusher.
The shards are dropped upon arrival I think because in the the video viktor flashes and the shard is created at his arrival location.
Got confirmed that the teleport drops where the cast is started, though.

"What are you gonna do, Zoe? TP to catch up to me? Good luck using Clarity as a gapcloser as well. :)"
So Double lift can't use flash at next worlds AGAIN?
" Some minions also drop a spell shard when Zoe kills them. "

> [{quoted}](name=GigglesO,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nALv9bwY,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-07T23:08:46.582+0000)
>
> " Some minions also drop a spell shard when Zoe kills them. "

make those last for 10, or maybe 5. ggez
Doublelift hard counter to Zoe?
Imagine jungle zoe. You can't flash away from her first gank since she essentially has 2 flashes.
Pretty sure they dont last 40s on the ground, they last 40s when you pick them up
They last 60s if you pick them
That could be it, if that is what I missed.

I think it is to facilitate her ability to gank other lanes.  Mid laners are meant to be pretty good roamers, especially kill focused ones.  Her kit points to it too with her E traveling further over walls and whatnot.

40 seconds tends to be a good time for roaming.  It facilitates the "Bot lane flashed, come gank Zoe." while also putting a time limiter on her to get down there to make use of it.  Generally it takes about 20 seconds to get to another lane without boots, considering Zoe doesn't appear to have a ton of waveclear early and it is based on what enemies use summoners, not up to her discretion 40 seconds seems about right.  Unlike a good number of other roamers her mobility doesn't actually let her get there any faster either, unless she happened to pick up ghost or something.

> [{quoted}](name=Fondling Gems,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nALv9bwY,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-07T23:47:33.052+0000)
>
> I think it is to facilitate her ability to gank other lanes.  Mid laners are meant to be pretty good roamers, especially kill focused ones.  Her kit points to it too with her E traveling further over walls and whatnot.
> 
> 40 seconds tends to be a good time for roaming.  It facilitates the "Bot lane flashed, come gank Zoe." while also putting a time limiter on her to get down there to make use of it.  Generally it takes about 20 seconds to get to another lane without boots, considering Zoe doesn't appear to have a ton of waveclear early and it is based on what enemies use summoners, not up to her discretion 40 seconds seems about right.  Unlike a good number of other roamers her mobility doesn't actually let her get there any faster either, unless she happened to pick up ghost or something.

I'd assume the bubble drops have a range necessary to them. Global minions randomly dropping powerful spells for a single character would be not just busted, but a cause for major screen clutter when it isn't relevant most of the time.

10 seconds would be plenty to make use of them during a skirmish.

She has to walk directly over them, and she has to hit the minions herself (actually last hit) to get the item. Zoe also only has ONE damage ability so is nowhere near as busted as people seem to think. Though, when that ONE ability hits from a fair distance... it hits hard.

Technically all her abilities other than ult do damage.  Her W also applies her passive so it is basically a 75% AP scaling targeted ability.

Her passive really isn't anything to sneeze at damage wise either.  Half as much damage as a lich bane, but no CD.  Her Q is definitely a big chunk of her damage, but definitely no more than 60% of it in most situations, and in drawn out fights where she can't set up for long distance Q's I expect her passive to play a big role in her damage output.
He passive only has 25% ap scaling, and her W wouldnt proc it 3 times unless the wording is a straight lie.
Each proc of W makes your passive activate from what I understand.

Her W procs the passive, as in, if your passive is up then a hit from W will also add in the passive damage proc so you don't have to autoattack.  But casting W will only proc the passive itself once.

If you cast other spells while your W is going off then the additional procs will go off on W hits.
Really? Must have misread had the passive and W works.

Her passive gives her damage, too.
And it is stated that she deals additional magic damage against drowsy targets with the first hit.

We don't know the numbers yet, but stating that she just has 1 damage ability is wrong.

this is very false Zoe has 4 damage abilties. one highly out classing the rest because it can melt an entire health bar is not a reason to disregard the 2 that chunk 20-30% of health bars and the one that does miniscule damage due to a redicilously busted effect.

Ws damage might as well not exist. But her E does do damage.

But her ult does not. and her passive doesnt count. so 2 abilities.

> I'd assume the bubble drops have a range necessary to them. Global minions randomly dropping powerful spells for a single character would be not just busted, but a cause for major screen clutter when it isn't relevant most of the time.

She has to last hit the minions so I think those only occur near her, actual uses of summoners are global though for ganking (like it was stated above).

Unlike a good number of other roamers her mobility doesn't actually let her get there any faster either, unless she happened to pick up ghost or something.

Why aren't people upvoting this? This makes good sense now, I cannot be the only person who was confused as to why it was 40 seconds and then read this? 

Or is this post invisible :O

It is because I am the quiet warden :P

I am not one of the big posters on the boards so I don't auto-generate up/down-votes.  However having a funny name colour makes some people treat you differently on the internet.  Basically means I even less upvotes/downvotes than I used to get.

Ah well, life is full of strange and nonsensical phenomenons eh?
Yo can I have a free name re-colour for no reason for free permanently?
No but I can say that I changed one of your rgb colours by 1 if it makes you feel better. :P

You sir, YOU! Are a true gentleman! Kudos to you!

I want 1 more in blue and 1 in yellow.
Gotta be more green than other people.
Shes going to be so broken just for the fact she can pick up and use all the broken support items like redemption locket etc

Those items are MUCH weaker without the shielding + healing increase stats though
And locket wont do much with her low hp
All which have 50% reduced effect from multiple casts

I can already see her dominating on the support role since her mana costs are really not that high and base damages are pretty high, especially her bubble which has a 440 base with 80% considering she can always get locket amd redemption from supports
And her harass is going to be crazy seeing as how she can just Vel'Koz it and fire away from the wave and redirect her attack.

she's still on the PBE, maybe they'll decrease it.

Does sound pretty long, but maybe she's balanced with that in mind. Or will be.
1/3 of her damage is gated by her being able to cast a summoner spell.
Its a certainlyTerrible champ so nope youre not missing anything.

Meanwhile, they reduced the time Trhesh souls are in the map because "They shouldn't be easy to collect". 

Error 404: logic not found.
wtf is a team fight gunna look like with her lol, 2 flashes + hers, ignite + hers, Barrier heal + heal. I hope this has a cooldown.
